title: Shadows of the Spire
stakes_shift: The antagonist is revealed to be a former member of Kaelen's order.

bridge.to_next: Vane begins the ritual of unmaking.

sections.title: The Antagonist's Court
sections.intent: Switch POV temporarily to show the threat.

scenes.summary: Vane stands amidst the ruins of a fallen temple, absorbing the energy of a smaller star-shard.
scenes.outcome: Vane’s power is shown to be far beyond Kaelen’s.

scenes.summary: Vane receives word that the 'Great Heart' has been taken by a survivor of the High Spire.
scenes.outcome: Vane identifies Kaelen as his primary target.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra are attacked by sentient vines warped by starlight.
scenes.outcome: Lyra uses her knowledge of botany and magic to find a path through.

scenes.summary: They find an ancient shrine to the stars, long abandoned.
scenes.outcome: The shrine contains a prophecy about the 'Oath-Breaker'.

scenes.summary: The Pale Riders enter the forest, using void-lanterns to track the shard’s signature.
scenes.outcome: The forest is no longer a safe haven.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra find an underground passage leading toward the mountains.
scenes.outcome: They move toward the next major location.
